name.baseName: Veterinary genetically engineered drugs and vaccines ; Microorganisms and microbial metabolites or animal serum ; Bioengineering process; NESPS2
兽用基因工程药物和疫苗 ; 微生物及微生物代谢产物或动物血清 ; 生物工程工艺 ; 小于200千克/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)

common:classification.common:class: Health, social services, beauty and wellness

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及每年生产不到200千克的兽用基因工程药物和疫苗的生物工程工艺。该生产过程使用微生物、微生物代谢产物或动物血清。此外，它还包括有关废水污染控制的各种末端处理技术的数据，具体针对化学需氧量(COD)、氨氮、有机结合氮和总磷的减少。数据集为不同处理组合（如物理化学处理、好氧生物处理、缺氧/好氧生物处理、厌氧水解和厌氧生物处理）提供了效率指标。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,三级代码275.0文件，在完整版文件中第3158页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anoxic/aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.5，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化处理+缺氧/好氧生物处理，其效率为98.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.5，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化处理+好氧生物处理，其效率为96.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisWithout terminal treatment technology，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是无末端治理技术，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
